alert.note: Alert for Penobscot (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 22 at 7:02PM EDT until May 22 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: The National Weather Service in Caribou Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Penobscot County in east central Maine... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 701 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Unity, or near Thorndike, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Hampden, Hermon, Orrington, Carmel, Newburgh, Etna and Dixmont. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
